commit message:
Remove suppressed warning.

We were suppressing the warning here because we were calling a function
available only in API 16. However, that causes crashes on some versions
of Android and using the Compat interface turned out to be a better
solution.

Now, we can remove the suppressed warning since there is no longer a
warning.

Merge pull request #142 from flerda/NewApi

Remove suppressed warning.
Script to change icons to release colors

Don't use an inlined style for the audio playback image.

This might have been needed in the older table layout but now serves no purpose. Removing this fixes a layout issue in Android 2.3, where the inlined image appears behind card content, making it untappable.

Merge pull request #143 from hssm/audio-image-inline

Don't use an inlined style for the audio playback image.
Make default font override card font.
Fix for issue #1933 syntax error in Romanian translation leading to crash during review
